welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Affton, the charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, this terminal offers exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights and includes amenities such as a lounge, conference rooms, and concierge services.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'SUS Free WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belleville Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Alton Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
